attributes.action: No statue of Alan Turing on the fourth plinth.
attributes.additional_details: Do not make a physical  statue of Alan Turing on the fourth plinth. Change the name of the fourth plinth to the Alan Turing plinth. The space on top of the plinth is then ran as it is today as a space for creative ideas and artistic expression. This would be a fitting memorial to Alan Turing's life's work and his contribution towards freedom for all during the second world war.
